data.eml:eml: An unexpected clade of South American ground beetles (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Bembidion)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maddison, David R. (2014): An unexpected clade of South American ground beetles (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Bembidion). ZooKeys 416: 113-155, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.416.7706, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.416.7706
